languages.text: "Футфол... Место, где грех и святость ходят рука об руку. Преподобный Иеронимус Скорбный наверняка будет ждать моего визита. Полагаю, с вами, {name}, он тоже захочет пообщаться".

traits.locale_text: "Футфол... Место, где грех и святость ходят рука об руку. Преподобный Зандор Альбинус наверняка будет ждать моего визита. Полагаю, с вами, {name}, он тоже захочет пообщаться".

languages.text: "Footfall... The place where filth and sanctity go hand in hand. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso will most likely expect a visit from me. I imagine he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Футфол... Место, где грех и святость ходят рука об руку. Преподобный Иеронимус Скорбный наверняка будет ждать моего визита. Полагаю, с вами, {name}, он тоже захочет пообщаться".

traits.locale_text: "Footfall... The place where sin and sanctity go hand in hand. Venerable Hieronimus the Mournful is probably waiting for me to visit. I suppose he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

"Footfall... The place where sin and sanctity go hand in hand. Venerable Hieronimus the Mournful is probably waiting for me to visit. I suppose he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

"Footfall... The place where sin and sanctity go hand in hand. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso will most likely expect a visit from me. I imagine he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

"Footfall... The place where sin and sanctity go hand in hand. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso will most likely expect a visit from me. I imagine he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

"Footfall... The place where filth and sanctity go hand in hand. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso will most likely expect a visit from me. I imagine he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

languages.text: «Paso... es un lugar donde la mugre y la santidad se mezclan. El reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso estará esperando que vaya a verle. Probablemente también quiera hablar con usted, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Footfall... The place where filth and sanctity go hand in hand. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso will most likely expect a visit from me. I imagine he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Paso... es un lugar donde el pecado y la santidad se mezclan. El reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso estará esperando que vaya a verle. Probablemente también quiera hablar con usted, {name}».

languages.text: “落脚港……罪恶与圣洁并存的地方。希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师很可能会期待我的来访。我猜测，他应该也会有兴趣与你谈谈，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Footfall... The place where filth and sanctity go hand in hand. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso will most likely expect a visit from me. I imagine he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “落脚港……罪恶与圣洁并存的地方。希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师很可能会期待我的来访。我猜测，他应该也会有兴趣与你谈谈，{name}。”

languages.text: 「フットフォール…そう、汚れと神聖さが共存する場所。ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭はきっと、我に会いに来て欲しがっているはずです。司祭もあなたと話したがっていると思います、{name}様」
languages.original_text: "Footfall... The place where filth and sanctity go hand in hand. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso will most likely expect a visit from me. I imagine he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォール…そう、汚れと神聖さが共存する場所。ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭はきっと、我に会いに来て欲しがっているはずです。司祭もあなたと話したがっていると思います、{name}様」

languages.text: "Footfall ... Der Ort, wo Schmutz und Heiligkeit Hand in Hand gehen. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso wird höchstwahrscheinlich erwarten, dass ich ihn besuche. Ich könnte mir vorstellen, dass er auch mit Euch sprechen möchte, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Footfall... The place where filth and sanctity go hand in hand. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso will most likely expect a visit from me. I imagine he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Footfall ... der Ort, wo Sünde und Heiligkeit Hand in Hand gehen. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso wird höchstwahrscheinlich erwarten, dass ich ihn besuche. Ich könnte mir vorstellen, dass er auch mit Euch sprechen möchte, {name}."

languages.text: « Castel... Un lieu où la corruption cohabite avec la piété. Le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso s'attend certainement à ce que je lui rende visite. Je pense qu'il souhaitera vous parler également, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Footfall... The place where filth and sanctity go hand in hand. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso will most likely expect a visit from me. I imagine he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Castel... Un lieu où le péché cohabite avec la piété. Le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso s'attend certainement à ce que je lui rende visite. Je pense qu'il souhaitera vous parler également, {name}. »

languages.text: "Binliman. Pislikle kutsallığın kol kola gezdiği yer. Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso büyük ihtimalle yanına uğramamı bekliyordur. Tahminimce seninle de konuşmak isteyecektir {name}."
languages.original_text: "Footfall... The place where filth and sanctity go hand in hand. Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso will most likely expect a visit from me. I imagine he will be interested in talking to you as well, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman. Pisliğin ve kutsallığın kol kola gezdiği yer. Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso büyük ihtimalle yanına uğramamı bekliyordur. Tahminimce seninle de konuşmak isteyecektir {name}."
